income_messages:
From: d********************e@outlook.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2023-04-18 22:45:40
SUBJECT:   INTERNATIONAL REMITTANCE /FO
  INTERNATIONAL REMITTANCE /FOREIGN OPERATIONS.
OF THE CENTRAL BANK OF NIGERIA (CBN)
Federal Capital Territory,
Abuja, Nigeria.
Our Ref: CBN/OHG/OXD1/2023
ATTENTION:DEAR BENEFICIARY
It my pressures to inform you that we have channel our central
computer for past for over 1 hour 30 minutes trying to transfer your
fund sum of USD$27,000,000.00 (Twenty Seven Million United States
Dollars) into your nominated Bank account without any further delay.
But the transfer is not going through and we have discover that we
need to get Transfer Acceptance Code from the International Monetary
Fund (IMF) office here in Nigeria before the transfer will be
successfully reflect in to your account immediately and it is very
important to get it to enable your fund sum of USD$27,000,000.00
(Twenty Seven Million United States Dollars) transfer into your
nominated Bank account today
Based on that the International Monetary Fund (IMF) is demanding for
US$95 before they can issue the Transfer Acceptance Code for the
completion of your fund transfer to us, So you advice to rush down to
the World Remit, Ria money transfer or Money Gram now and send the
US$95 immediately to enable your fund sum of USD$27,000,000.00 (Twenty
Seven Million United States Dollars) successfully reflect into your
account within 48hours which has been approved by the Office of the
Presidency Abuja and Federal Ministry of Finance with our Bank, you
are to follow due process to enable us complete this transfer and send
all the necessary documents that prove to you that you are the real
beneficiary of this fund to enable you go to your bank and confirm
your USD$27,000,000.00 (Twenty Seven Million United States Dollars)
into your account immediately without any problem or delays.
I implore you to do the needful and ensure the fee (US$1,850)is paid
as directed with below information so that we can obtain the Transfer
Acceptance Code from the (IMF) immediately and authorize the
International Remittance Department to effect the transfer into you
provided details immediately.
Receiver's Name. OKELUE CHIEDU PATRICK
Country. Nigeria
City. Abuja
Telephone: +234-9077679845
Amount: US$ 95 only
As soon as the fee is received, we shall immediately dispatch the ATM
cash Card to you and it will take only 2days to arrive to your address
to enable you start withdrawing funds that same day from any ATM
machine nearest to you.
Thanks for your understanding and we are waiting for your quick reply
and the payment information.
Yours in service,
Mr.Godwin Emefiele
The DIRECTOR, INTERNATIONAL
REMITTANCE /FOREIGN OPERATIONS.
OF THE CENTRAL BANK OF NIGERIA,   
From: d********************e@outlook.com
To: su44442@l******s.email
Time: 2023-04-18 23:08:57
SUBJECT: Re:   INTERNATIONAL REMITTANCE /FO
[Home Page]
INTERNATIONAL REMITTANCE DEPARTMENT
Plot 33, Abubakar Tafawa Balewa Way
Central Business District,
P.M.B. 0187 Garki, Central District,
Abuja. Nigeria
 ATTENTION:DEAR BENEFICIARY
.Thanks for your kind respond to Central Bank Online Department.
It is my pressures to inform you that after the meeting with the boards of director concerning, your approved fund ,it was approved by the Federal Ministry of Finance Mrs. (Dr.) Zainab Shamsuna Ahmed and Mr. António Guterres, Secretary-General of the United Nations to release your fund by an ATM Card valued USD$27,000,000.00 is now ready to deliver to your doorstep .
I wish to further intimate you that, every necessary arrangement is being made to affect the release of your fund to you as the Beneficiary of the approved fund . So kindly proceed and send the delivery fee sum of US$95.00 through World Remit , Ria money transfer or Bitcoin Wallet to enable your valued USD$27,000,000.00 release to you within 24hrs as soon as you make the payment so that you can start using it to withdraw money in any ATM machines of your choice over there in your country without any problem.
Here is the ATM CARD information don't release it to anybody for security purpose, meanwhile the attachment here is copy of my ID Card.
YOUR ATM CARD INFORMATION CODES
{WITHDRAWAL PIN CODE#: 4825}
{SECURITY CODE#: 902 }
{CARD NO# 4083 0521 0023 3546}
{Verification Code#: VICBU0212235}
{EXPIRES END VERVAL EINDE 01/25}
Once below is the information you will use to send the money so that i can get the Transfer Acceptance Code from the (IMF) immediately so that will authorize International Remittance Department to affect the transfer into you provided details immediately.
Receiver's Name. OKELUE CHIEDU PATRICK
Country. Nigeria
City. Abuja
Telephone: +234-9077679845
Amount: US$ 95 only
Finally, I implore you to do the needful and ensure the fee (US$95) is paid as directed, to enable us dispatch your ATM CARD to you to enable you start withdrawing funds that same day from any ATM machine nearest to you without any delay.
Thanks for your understanding and we are waiting for your quick reply and the payment information.
Yours in service,
Gov. Mr. Godwin Emefiele
E_mail: Godwinemefiele233@aol.com
Executive Director, Corporate Banking/Foreign Remittance Dept.

outbound_messages:
From: su44442@l******s.email
To: d********************e@outlook.com
Time: 2023-04-18 22:45:44
SUBJECT: Re:   INTERNATIONAL REMITTANCE /FO
Hello, thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the information you have provided about the transfer of my funds. However, I am a bit confused about the Transfer Acceptance Code from the Monetary Fund IMF office. Can you please explain to me what this code is and why it is necessary for the transfer to go through? Also, I am hesitant to send any money without proper verification and documentation. Can you please provide me with more information and proof that I am the rightful owner of the funds before I proceed with any payments? Thank you.
Best wishes,
Alisha
From: su44442@l******s.email
To: d********************e@outlook.com
Time: 2023-04-19 01:45:39
SUBJECT: Re:   INTERNATIONAL REMITTANCE /FO
Hello,
Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the release of my approved fund. I appreciate the update and would like to know more about the process. Can you provide me with more information about the delivery fee and why it is necessary? Also, can you confirm the total amount of the approved fund and how it will be delivered to me?
I would like to proceed with caution and ensure the safety of my personal information. Can you provide me with more details about the security measures in place for the delivery of the ATM card?
Thank you for your time and assistance.
Best regards.
Best wishes,
Alisha
